job.title: Software Development Engineer - Test (SDET)
job.description: Were looking for a ltstronggtSoftware Development Engineer  Testltstronggt to join our Philips Hue Partnerships ampamp Entertainment Engineering Team in Palo Alto CalifornialtbrgtltbrgtWorking for Signify means being creative and adaptive Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career Together were transforming our industryltbrgtltbrgtAs the world leader in lighting were constantly ahead of the curve Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things were breaking new grounds in data analytics AI and smart homes offices cities and moreltbrgtltbrgtSignify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025ltbrgtltbrgtAs a Software Development Engineer  Test youll be responsible for End2End CICD Continuous Integration and Continuous DeliveryDeployment and test automation of these products with a focus on APIbased integration testing of the device firmware and Cloud backendsltbrgtltbrgtBy joining the global Philips Hue business youll be working on the worlds leading internet connected home lighting system which is changing the way people interact and experience lighting The Hue ecosystem is expanding rapidly through new lights accessories and exciting new usecases such as using lighting to make your home more secure or create an immersive home theater experienceltbrgtltbrgtWe are a small fastgrowing multidisciplinary engineering team in the Bay Area with the large responsibilities to create and maintain Philips Hue partnership integrations and Hue Entertainment products We develop firstofakind products that can synchronize lighting with games movies and music and we build integrations with products from other leading Smart Home and Entertainment companiesltbrgtltbrgtWere on the lookout for forwardthinking innovators with a passion for IoT Smart Home and Entertainment who are excited to help us build the next level home lighting experience If you match this description get in touchltbrgtltbrgtWhat youll doltbrgtltulgtltligtDefine the test automation strategy and develop CICD and test automation frameworks to support new product launchesltligtltligtImplement automated test cases for our Partnership Integrations and Hue Entertainment products such as the Philips Hue Sync BoxltligtltligtDocument investigate and communicate defects discovered during test executionltligtltligtRepresent Philips Hue in Connectivity Standards Alliance test scripting group working with other leading Smart Home companies to build the technologies that will power the next generation IoT ecosystems ltligtltligtClosely collaborate with QA software developers product managers and external partners both onsite and internationally to jointly ensure we deliver high quality productsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtYour QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMinimum of a Bachelors degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering Electrical Engineering or related ltligtltligt4 years of experience in software engineering or software testing and 2 years track record in developing robust scalable test automation solutions for complex software products ltligtltligtExperience with Java and Python or similar languages automation tools like Jenkins and network communication technologies including HTTP APIsltligtltligtEffective communication and collaboration skillsltligtltligtStrong quality mindset and passion for delivering the best consumer IoT and Smart Home product experiencesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferredltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience testing IoT products combining device firmware and cloud servicesltligtltligtDomain knowledge in Smart Home andor AudioVideo processingltbrgtltligtltulgtWho we areltbrgtltbrgtSignify is the world leader in lighting We provide professional customers and consumers with quality energyefficient LED lighting And our lights when connected bring data to devices apps and people  redefining what light can do and how you use it Today our innovations such as Philips Hue LiFi  internet connectivity through light  and UVC solar and horticultural lighting contribute to a safer smarter more sustainable world Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025 Were operating in 74 countries with 32000 people worldwideltbrgtltbrgt
